channel.title: Height Methods

item.title: Height Methods
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Does anyone have a height method which will allow you to change the height of GFX’s?

I use this.

public void playerGfx(int id, int delay) {
mask100var1 = id;
mask100var2 = delay;
mask100update = true;
updateRequired = true;
}

And i have this…

public void playerGfx2(int id, int delay, int height) {
mask100var1 = id;
mask100var2 = delay;
mask100update = true;
updateRequired = true;
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(absY + (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(absX - (mapRegionX * 8));
outStream.createFrame(4);
outStream.writeByte(0);//Tiles away (X >> 4 + Y & 7)
outStream.writeByte(height);//height of the spell above it's basic place, i think it's written in pixels 100 pixels higher
outStream.writeWord(delay);//Time before casting the graphic
}

When i use …

playerGfx2(252, 0, 100);

252 = Graphic.
0 = Delay.
100 = Height…

When i attack someone, it laggs me out, just disconnects automatically…

So could someone make me a height method, or add something to the following method, so that i will be able to control the height of the graphic?

public void playerGfx(int id, int delay) {
mask100var1 = id;
mask100var2 = delay;
mask100update = true;
updateRequired = true;
}

Thanks.

Read full topic
